Header.title: Chip-locked
Header.paragraph: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis sed dapibus leo nec ornare diam sed commodo nibh ante facilisis bibendum.

About.paragraph: Hi! My name's Jase, I'm the creator of Chip-locked. I've been playing disc golf for many years now. I think it's one of the best ways to spend and afternoon with friends and family, and this game was made to throw more fun into those times. My brother and I have always enjoyed competing and recently he's taken a leap forward in his disc golf skill where I have stayed the same. When we'd play a round together it would mostly be us playing to beat our personal best rather than competing. That's why I created Chip-locked, to bring back that competitive spirit! We found as we tested my game that we were having more fun right away, each shot had more excitement, there always was a chance for the lead to change on each hole. We also liked that playing didn't get in the way of a normal round, we played Chip-locked along side a round of disc golf, the exchanging of chips between the holes was quick and satisfying when you take a good chip from your opponent or give your bad chip to them!
